Plot: Lama Norbu comes to Seattle in search of the reincarnation of his dead teacher, Lama Dorje. His search leads him to young Jesse Conrad, Raju, a waif from Kathmandu, and an upper class ...
Title: Little Buddha
Writer: Bernardo Bertolucci (story), Rudy Wurlitzer (screenplay), Mark Peploe (screenplay)
Actors: Keanu Reeves, Ruocheng Ying, Chris Isaak, Alex Wiesendanger
